name: Teenage Revolution Online Trivia | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is the leader of the Legion?
questions.explanation:
Cosmic Boy.

	Cosmic Boy has magnetic powers and hails from the world of Braal. Traditionally his costume has been pink, but in this book it is blue. He often feuds with Brainiac 5.

questions.text: Which Legionnaire-to-be is hit by his father?
questions.explanation:
Invisible Kid.

	Lyle Norg is Invisible Kid, with the power to become invisible, as his name implies. He is very nervous and a new addition to the team.

questions.text: Ultra Boy can only use one power at a time. What power does he have all the time?
questions.explanation:
Flying.

	All Legionnaires are given special rings that enable flight, communication and a shield from the all-seeing Public Service, which monitors children until they are 18.

True.

	Chameleon has no specific gender and is a bit naive. He is actually from the planet Durla. He can change his physical appearance and sometimes turns into monsters to fight and scare enemies.

questions.text: Colossal Boy prefers to be known as Micro Lad.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Colossal Boy comes from a race of giants. He has the ability to shrink to 6 feet tall and his home planet is Earth. I'd say 6 feet doesn't make you small at all!

Increase an object's mass.

	Star Boy, in this series, is African-American, where he had previously been drawn as a Caucasian. His real name is Thom Kallor and he comes from the planet Xanthu.

questions.text: Dream Girl can only see one week into the future.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Dream Girl sees the future in dreams or visions, and comes from a race of aliens who all have the same power. She can see years into the future or seconds. She claims that one day she and Brainiac 5 will marry.

questions.text: Element Lad and Triplicate Girl go on a date, a rare thing in the 30th Century. Who gives Element Boy advice?
questions.explanation:
Phantom Girl.

	Element Lad is Jan Arrah, who can transmute objects for a short while by touching them. Triplicate Girl is from the planet Cargg, and can split into three copies of herself.

True.

	Elysion is the potentially insane leader of Terror Firma, a group of superpowered people who feel that they have been neglected by the United Planets. They are recruited by Lemnos, a man who wants to push society out of complacency by starting a war.

Orando.

	Orando is Princess Projectra's homeworld. Projectra shows no powers in this book except incredible wealth. She is a member of Orando's ruling family and is very spoiled.
